notesStmt.note: Some additional notes and inscriptions, folio 1r. ῾Amram ben Ṭuvyah: inscribed in the colophon, folio 202v.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: The third book (Sefer zemanim) of Maimonides' Mishneh Torah.

collation.p: 17 quires of 12 leaves each, marked with catchwords and numbered with Hebrew letters at the beginning and at the end.

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Yemenite semi-cursive script of the 14th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Spine title: 'Maimonides. Mishne Tora. Book III. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Oriental 2357.'
